title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.1 - Access to domestic animal premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.1 - Access to domestic animal premises

State Regulations

The commissioner, each veterinarian, inspector and other
authorized employees of the Department of Agriculture and Markets shall have
full access to all lands, buildings or housing upon or in which there are kept
for breeding, raising, feeding or slaughtering, domestic animals, including
poultry, and may examine such animals and their feedstuffs, together with any
equipment and containers used in the manufacture, preparation, raising, cooking
or treating of such feedstuffs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

52.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
